meanings.definition: Excessively regulated or restrained in behavior or emotions.
meanings.sent1: The overcontrolled child always followed the rules without question.
meanings.sent2: She felt overcontrolled by the strict guidelines at work.
meanings.sent3: The overcontrolled robot refused to dance even when the music played.
meanings.sent4: Her overcontrolled demeanor was like a tightly closed box, hiding her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The overcontrolled garden had perfectly trimmed hedges and not a single flower out of place.

meanings.sent1: His overcontrolled response to the situation surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The overcontrolled driver never exceeded the speed limit.
meanings.sent3: The overcontrolled chef refused to add any extra seasoning to the dish.
meanings.sent4: Her overcontrolled painting had precise brush strokes that left no room for spontaneity.
meanings.sent5: The overcontrolled student meticulously organized every aspect of the project.
